definition: Jean-Marie Le Pen (1928-), French Front National extreme right-wing politician
to rein in/to compel/to force/to carve/to engrave/(literary) to command/to lead/bridle/(physics) abbr. for 勒克斯[le4 ke4 si1], lux

sentences.english: It's why the great winner - and it's a pity - is Mrs.
sentences.chinese: 这就是为什么大赢家是勒庞，这是令人遗憾的。

sentences.english: It's why the great winner - and it's a pity - is Mrs. Le Pen.
sentences.chinese: 这就是为什么大赢家是勒庞，这是令人遗憾的。

sentences.english: The correct answer about the probability of a Le Pen victory is that I do not have the foggiest.
sentences.chinese: 对于勒庞获胜几率的正确答案是，我一点也不知道。

sentences.english: Mr Le Pen has again called the Nazi gas chambers "a detail of history".
sentences.chinese: 勒庞再次称纳粹毒气室是“细枝末节”。

sentences.english: She has described him as politically discredited.
sentences.chinese: 勒庞形容他政治名誉扫地。

definition: (Tw) Emmanuel Macron (1977-), president of France from 2017
Emmanuel Macron (1977-), president of France from 2017
the Narodniks, Russian populist group in the 19th century
